root.name: Yumeria
root.description: OverviewYumeria is a visual novel in the harem-comedy genre with fantasy elements developed by Namco for the PlayStation 2 and was only ever released in Japan in 2003.The anime series based on the game and produced by Studio Deen aired in 2004, a year after the game's release in Japan. Two characters from Yumeria, Neito and Neneko, appear in the crossover collaboration Project X Zone.
